general_details.the_landsverk_180_armoured_car__it_was_b:
The Landsverk 180 Armoured car, it was based on the  Armoured Car chassis and was in use from 1935.

           Specifications    Operational Date(s)1935    Ordnance classification     Quantity Produced0    Weightunknown    Crew5    M.G's small3    M.G's large(>10mm)n/a    Length5.82 mtr    Width2.18 mtr    Height2.12 mtr    Engine Details/Performance    Max Road Speed50 mph    Max Cross Country Speedunknown    Range Road0 miles    Range Cross Countryunknown    Fuel TypeUnknown    Fuel Capacityunknown    Horse Power0 hp    Power/Weightunknown              General Information    The Landsverk 180 Armoured car, it was based on the  Armoured Car chassis and was in use from 1935.It was armed with 3 light machine guns.

general_details.the_strv__landsverk__l_60__it_was_based_:
The Strv (Landsverk) L-60, it was based on the  Light Tank chassis and was in use from 1934. It was commonly called a Landsverk.


      
      
      
   General Details (Light Tank)
           Specifications    Operational Date(s)1934    Ordnance classification     Quantity Produced0    Weightunknown    Crew3    M.G's small1    M.G's large(>10mm)n/a    Length4.65 mtr    Width2.03 mtr    Height2.08 mtr    Engine Details/Performance    Max Road Speed25 mph    Max Cross Country Speedunknown    Range Road0 miles    Range Cross Countryunknown    Fuel TypeUnknown    Fuel Capacityunknown    Horse Power0 hp    Power/Weightunknown              General Information    The Strv (Landsverk) L-60, it was based on the  Light Tank chassis and was in use from 1934. It was commonly called a Landsverk.It was armed with 1 light machine gun. Its main armament consisted  of a 2.0cm Madsen L/60 which could penetrate 7 mm of flat plate at 800 metres
